mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HUMAN_COMMUTE B( B.HC_COMNUM ,B.HM_EMPNUM ,B.HM_NAME ,B.HC_DATE ,B.HM_DEPTNUM ,B.HC_TANDA )SELECT ( 'C'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')||SUBSTR(A.HM_EMPNUM, -4,4)) -- 전체 직원의 출근채번 ,A.HM_EMPNUM -- 전체 직원의 사원번호 ,A.HM_NAME -- 전체 직원의 이름 ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') -- 해당 날짜 ,A.HM_DEPTNUM ,'70' FROM HUMAN_MEMBER A WHERE A.HM_EMPNUM != 'H000000000000' AND A.HM_DELETEYN != 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT HC_COMNUM FROM HUMAN_COMMUTE WHERE HM_EMPNUM = #{hm_empnum} AND HC_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT NVL(HC_TOTALHOUR, 0) HC_TOTALHOUR ,NVL(HC_LASTHOUR, 0) HC_LASTHOUR ,NVL(HC_EXTRAWORKING, 0) HC_EXTRAWORKING FROM ( SELECT * FROM HUMAN_COMMUTE WHERE HM_EMPNUM = #{hm_empnum} AND HC_DATE != TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'YYYYMMDD') AND HC_LASTHOUR IS NOT NULL ORDER BY HC_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT A.HC_COMNUM HC_COMNUM ,A.HM_EMPNUM HM_EMPNUM ,A.HM_NAME HM_NAME ,A.HC_LASTHOUR HC_LASTHOUR ,B.CD_NAME HM_DEPTNUM ,A.HC_EXTRAWORKING HC_EXTRAWORKING ,A.HC_TOTALHOUR HC_TOTALHOUR ,A.HC_DAYHOUR HC_DAYHOUR ,A.HC_WEEKHOUR HC_WEEKHOUR ,TO_DATE(A.HC_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') HC_DATE ,TO_DATE(A.HC_WORKIN, 'HH24:MI') HC_WORKIN ,TO_DATE(A.HC_WORKOUT, 'HH24:MI') HC_WORKOUT FROM HUMAN_COMMUTE A, CODE B WHERE B.CD_CODE IN (SELECT SUBSTR(A.HM_DEPTNUM ,-2,2) FROM HUMAN_COMMUTE) AND HC_COMNUM = #{hc_comnum}
mapper.update:
UPDATE HUMAN_COMMUTE A SET A.HC_WORKOUT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE , 'HH24MI') ,A.HC_DAYHOUR = (SELECT TRUNC(ABS(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE , 'MI'),'HH24MI'),'HH24MI') - TO_DATE( B.HC_WORKIN,'HH24MI')) *24*60,2) FROM HUMAN_COMMUTE B WHERE B.HC_COMNUM = #{hc_comnum}) ,A.HC_LASTHOUR = (SELECT C.HC_LASTHOUR - (SELECT TRUNC(ABS(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE , 'MI'),'HH24MI'),'HH24MI') - TO_DATE( B.HC_WORKIN,'HH24MI')) *24*60,2) FROM HUMAN_COMMUTE B WHERE B.HC_COMNUM = #{HC_COMNUM}) FROM HUMAN_COMMUTE C WHERE C.HC_COMNUM = ('C'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'YYYYMMDD')||SUBSTR(A.HM_EMPNUM ,-4,4)))
